# Next steps

Thank you for completing the __Tercen__ Crabs Tutorial.

You will have learned some of the powerful visualisations __Tercen__ offers for data.

If you would like to give feedback on this document please log an [__issue__](https://github.com/tercen/crabs_tutorial/issues) on our GitHub repository.

There is much more to discover about the software. 

Here are some ideas on what to do next:

Try to upload different data sets and play with making different projection visuals

Complete our documentation set by reading the online [__Tercen User Manual__](https://tercen.github.io/tercen-book/)

[__Book a one-2-one session__](https://calendly.com/tercen-demo/tercen-demo) for further guidance
